Some Of Our Capabilities

Services

Cyber Security

Strategic Analytix provides cyber security expertise in support of intelligence and counter-terrorism operations to our Department of Defense customers. SA works alongside U.S. government agencies and major defense and intelligence companies on projects that require a responsive approach to their most critical mission needs.
We pride ourselves on our high quality people, technical innovation and mission expertise. Some of our core capabilities include:
  • Computer Network Operation/Exploitation/Defense
  • Systems Analysis
  • Malware Analysis & Reverse Engineering
  • Computer Forensics
  • Mobile Platform Engineering/AnalysisData Analystics

System Engineering

Strategic Analytix attracts and retains technical leaders in the field of Systems Engineering, providing innovative solutions to our customers greatest challenges. Our goal is to provide technical support and insight based on industriesâ€™ latest tools and techniques to keep up with a rapidly evolving technological environment.
Some of our core capabilities include:
  • Cloud Computing/Security
  • Systems Architecture
  • Software Engineering
  • Test Engineers
  • Usability Engineers
  • Life Cycle Development Systems Engineers

Programmatic & Acquisition

Strategic Analytix is a leader in the area of programmatic and business services. We deliver a broad range of key program management and Systems Engineering and Technical Assistance (SETA) services that include contract/acquisition support, PMO architecture and system engineering, project/portfolio management and financial analysis.
As a trusted adviser, our objective is to help our customers gain efficiencies through our business analysis and technical insight. Our expertise include:
  • Contract DevelopmentAcquisition Support / Documentation (Milestone A-C)
  • Financial Analysis / Business Management
  • Integrated Master Scheduling (Primavera)
  • Lean Six Sigma
  • Risk Management
  • CBJB Support
  • Acquisition Logistics Management
  • Basis of Estimates (BOE)
